title: MEAN GIRLS
synopsis: Cady Heron is a hit with the Plastics, an A-list girl clique at her new school. But everything changes when she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

title: LOVE LIES BLEEDING
synopsis: Lou, la gerante d'un gym, tombe eperdument amoureuse de Jackie, une culturiste ambitieuse en route vers Vegas pour y accomplir ses reves. Leur amour explosif les entraine malgre elles dans une spirale de violence, y melant du meme coup la famille de criminels de Lou.

title: PAUVRES CREATURES
synopsis: L'evolution fantastique de Bella Baxter, jeune femme ramenee a la vie par le non conventionnel scientifique Dr Godwin Baxter. Sous la protection de Baxter, Bella est avide d'apprendre. Affamee de connaissances du monde, elle s'enfuit pour une aventure tourbillonnante a travers les continents.

title: ANATOMIE D'UNE CHUTE
synopsis: Sandra, Samuel et leur fils malvoyant de 11 ans, Daniel, vivent depuis un an loin de tout, a la montagne. Un jour, Samuel est retrouve mort au pied de leur maison. Une enquete pour mort suspecte est ouverte. Sandra est bientot inculpee malgre le doute : suicide ou homicide ?

title: INSUBMERSIBLE
synopsis: L'ancienne sportive de haut niveau Diana Nyad entreprend a 60 ans de realiser le reve le plus fou de sa vie : nager les 160 kilometres qui separent Cuba de la Floride.

title: 24 HEURES A NEW-YORK
synopsis: Over the course of a single hectic day in New York City, three people from Fena's past are thrust back into his life. Having lost touch since transitioning from female to male, he navigates the new dynamics of old relationships while tackling the day-to-day challenges of living life in between.

title: BOTTOMS
synopsis: Two unpopular queer girls in their senior year start a fight club to try to impress and hook up with cheerleaders.

title: HOW TO BLOW UP A PIPELINE
synopsis: Xochitl's frustration with the climate crisis leads her to engage in symbolic acts of sabotage and property destruction. With radical determination, she assembles a crew of friends and strangers, each with their own struggles, to undertake a daring mission to destroy a pipeline in West Texas.

title: L'IMMENSITE
synopsis: L'histoire d'amour entre Clara et ses enfants, qui se deroule a Rome dans les annees 70. Son aine ne s'identifie pas a son sexe biologique.

title: LES CINQ DIABLES
synopsis: Vicky, petite fille etrange et solitaire, a un don : elle peut sentir et reproduire toutes les odeurs de son choix qu'elle collectionne dans des bocaux etiquetes avec soin. Elle a extrait en secret l'odeur de sa mere, Joanne, a qui elle voue un amour fou et exclusif, presque maladif.

title: BLUE JEAN
synopsis: 1988. In a climate of rampant homophobia, PE teacher Jean is forced to live a double life. A respected member of staff during the week; on the weekend she slips into Newcastle's gay scene. When a new student threatens to expose her, Jean is caught in a dilemma to protect her job and her integrity.

title: HEARTSTOPPER
synopsis: Teens Charlie and Nick discover their unlikely friendship might be something more as they navigate school and young love in this coming-of-age series.

title: QUEER AS FOLK
synopsis: It centers on a group of club-going friends who find support in the gay community following a tragedy.

title: PAPER GIRLS
synopsis: A few hours after 1988 Halloween night, four 12-year old girls have to face a mission. Trapped in a complicated conflict, they will travel in time to save the world.

title: HEARTBREAK HIGH
synopsis: A fresh look at Hartley High over 20 years on. With her new friends - outsiders Quinni and Darren - Amerie must repair her reputation, while navigating love, sex, and heartbreak. Reboot from 1994 TV Series

title: MINX
synopsis: In 1970s Los Angeles, an earnest young feminist joins forces with a low-rent publisher to create the first erotic magazine for women.

title: BAD SISTERS
synopsis: Based on the Flemish series Clan, this re-imagining is set in Ireland and follows the Garvey sisters, who are bound together by the death of their parents and a promise to protect one another.

title: FIRST KILL
synopsis: Falling in love is tricky for teens Juliette and Calliope: One's a vampire, the other's a vampire hunter and both are ready to make their first kill.

title: BLACK PANTHER: WAKANDA FOREVER
synopsis: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

title: WEDNESDAY
synopsis: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents.

title: ARDENTE*X*S
synopsis: Un collectif suisse de femmes et de personnes queers se lance dans la production video en tant que pornographes, ayant a coeur de redefinir l'idee que l'on se fait de l'industrie du X. Les participant*e*s produisent des films non genres, ethiques, centres sur une sexualite saine et affranchie.

title: SIRENS
synopsis: On the outskirts of Beirut, a young women and her bandmates navigate friendship, identity and a future spiraling quickly out of control in their pursuit of becoming thrash metal rock stars. Sirens is a gothic coming-of-age documentary currently in late production.

title: NELLY & NADINE
synopsis: Nelly and Nadine is the unlikely love story between two women falling in love on Christmas Eve, 1944, in the Ravensbruck concentration camp. For many years their relationship was kept a secret.

title: ESTHER NEWTON MADE ME GAY
synopsis: Esther Newton was drawn to the drag scene as a student in the 1950s. The film's amazing archive footage encompasses gay liberation, the feminist sex wars, AIDS activism and life on the safe haven of Fire Island.

title: SO DAMN EASY GOING
synopsis: Joanna's brain is like an analogue twitter, also known as ADHD. When her medicine runs out she tries to handle the stress for money, the consequences of an unexpected drug deal and her blustery feelings for Audrey.

title: SISSY
synopsis: Teen best friends Cecilia and Emma, after a decade run into each other. Cecilia is invited on Emma's bachelorette weekend where she gets stuck in a remote cabin with her high school bully with a taste for revenge.

title: PETIT MAL
synopsis: Have you ever met a throuple? We are opening our home's doors to show you how is our life, how we, as a women's throuple, live the absence of one of us. This real fiction show us how we deal with loneliness, jealousy and how we have to adapt ourselves when three become two.

title: MAYBE SOMEDAY
synopsis: In the midst of separating from her wife, Jay attempts to move across the country to start her life over again as she grapples with the inevitable cycles of love, loss, and everything in between.

title: MARS ONE
synopsis: The Martins family are optimistic dreamers, quietly leading their lives in the margins of a major Brazilian city following the disappointing inauguration of a far-right extremist president. A lower-middle-class Black family, they feel the strain of their new reality as the political dust settles.

title: I'LL SHOW YOU MINE
synopsis: An author who has made her career by examining her own trauma interviews her nephew about his history of exploitation as a gender-nonconforming model and pansexual poster boy. But to get to the most hidden parts of his story, she must reciprocate by digging into areas she has scrupulously manage...

title: LOVING HIGHSMITH
synopsis: Based on Patricia Highsmith's personal writings and accounts of her family and lovers, the film casts new light on the famous thriller writer's life and oeuvre, permeated by themes of love and its defining influence on identity.

title: LIGHTYEAR
synopsis: While spending years attempting to return home, marooned Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear encounters an army of ruthless robots commanded by Zurg who are attempting to steal his fuel source.

title: GIRL PICTURE
synopsis: Best friends Mimmi and Ronkko work after school at a foodcourt smoothie kiosk, frankly swapping stories of their frustrations and expectations regarding love and sex.

title: THREE TIDY TIGERS TIED A TIE TIGHTER
synopsis: Gustavo Vinagre shows young queer people in Sao Paulo defying both the virus and the political failure of their government.

title: A LEAGUE OF THEIR OWN
synopsis: A League of Their Own evokes the joyful spirit of Penny Marshall's beloved classic, while widening the lens to tell the story of an entire generation of women who dreamed of playing professional baseball.

title: CRUSH
synopsis: An aspiring young artist joins her high school track team and later discovers what real love feels like when she finds herself falling for an unexpected teammate.

title: BADHAAI DO
synopsis: Shardul Thakur and Suman Singh enter into a marriage of convenience but chaos ensues when her girlfriend comes to stay with them.

title: THE SYED FAMILY XMAS EVE GAME NIGHT
synopsis: All cards are on the table when a queer Pakistani Muslim woman brings her Puerto Rican girlfriend home for the first time on the family's annual game night.

title: RESERVATION DOGS
synopsis: A coming-of-age drama that will follow the story of four teenagers in a Native American housing project in Oklahoma who commit petty crimes.

title: THE FALLOUT
synopsis: High schooler Vada navigates the emotional fallout she experiences in the wake of a school tragedy. Relationships with her family, friends and view of the world are forever altered.

title: PURE GRIT
synopsis: Pure Grit is both a thrilling tale of extreme bareback horse racing, and an intimate love story. Chronicling three years in the life of a young Native American bareback horse racer, her dogged determination, and the relationships that sustain her. Sharmaine dreams of becoming a champion.

title: HACKS
synopsis: Explores a dark mentorship that forms between Deborah Vance, a legendary Las Vegas comedian, and an entitled, outcast 25-year-old.

title: MONSTERDYKE
synopsis: A transgressive portrait of desire shot on 16mm, MONSTER DYKE examines trans-lesbian love and longing with humour, heat, puppetry and a subversive twist.

title: STATION ELEVEN
synopsis: Survivors of a devastating flu pandemic try to rebuild their lives after losing everything.

title: FANNY: THE RIGHT TO ROCK
synopsis: Ferocious female rockers Fanny shattered glass ceilings in the '70s, collecting fans like David Bowie before being buried in retro record bins. Fifty years later, they reunite with a new record deal and a chance to rewrite history.

title: THE SEX LIVES OF COLLEGE GIRLS
synopsis: Three 18-year-old freshman roommates at Evermore College in Vermont. A bundle of contradictions and hormones, these sexually active college girls are equal parts lovable and infuriating.

title: FRAGRANCE OF THE FIRST FLOWER
synopsis: Reveals the love and lust between two women, the conflicts between gay family and traditional stereotypes. It finds back the forgotten love with a romantic touch.

title: SORT OF
synopsis: Follows a gender-fluid millennial who straddles various identities, exposing the identities and labels that are no longer applicable.

title: BESTIES
synopsis: Paris. Nedjma, a teenager living with her mom and sister, spends the summer with her squad. She sees her life turned upside down when she meets Zina, coming from the opposite gang. They are rivals in broad daylight , but lovers in secret.

title: ULTRAVIOLETTE AND THE BLOOD-SPITTERS GANG
synopsis: The passionate letters that a girl called Marcelle wrote to her childhood sweetheart from a sanatorium during the interwar period evoke the image of a rebel, way ahead of her time, who goes her own way with a group of kindred spirits.

title: THE WHITE LOTUS
synopsis: The White Lotus follows the vacations of various hotel guests over the span of a week as they relax and rejuvenate in paradise.

title: RIDE OR DIE
synopsis: Rei is a lesbian in her 20s who, upon learning that her former classmate Nanae is suffering brutal domestic violence from her husband, decides to kill him to show her love for Nanae.

title: BENEDETTA
synopsis: Une scandaleuse liaison lesbienne ebranle un couvent de la Toscane du XVIIe siecle. Benedetta, une religieuse en proie a des visions de Jesus sensuelles et violentes, eveille les soupcons de Soeur Felicita. La mefiance grandit lorsque Bartolomea commence a etre dangereusement attiree par Benedetta.

title: MADRES PARALELAS
synopsis: Deux femmes, Janis et Ana, se retrouvent dans une chambre d'hopital ou elles vont accoucher. Toutes deux sont celibataires et sont tombees enceintes par accident. Janis, la plus agee, est toute a son bonheur. Ana, encore adolescente, demeure traumatisee par l'experience.

title: ALL OUR FEARS
synopsis: Daniel is respected by his village community as long as he bravely supports the fight for their affairs. He is in love with the boy next door, Olek, who is not ready to reveal his sexual identity.

title: MA BELLE, MY BEAUTY
synopsis: A surprise reunion in southern France reignites passions and jealousies between two women who were formerly polyamorous lovers.

title: SHEER QORMA
synopsis: Sheer Qorma is a story of belonging and acceptance, identity and family told through courageous, queer women who choose to embrace a love that exists beyond their personal beliefs and social moralities.

title: CAMILA COMES OUT TONIGHT
synopsis: When her grandmother falls seriously ill, Camila must move to Buenos Aires, leaving her friends and an easy-going comprehensive school for a traditional private institution. Camila's ferocious but immature temperament will be put to the test.

title: NO STRAIGHT LINES: THE RISE OF QUEER COMICS
synopsis: A lively look at five LGBTQ+ comic book artists whose careers go from the underground scene to the cover of Time Magazine and the international stage. An adaption of Justin Hall's anthology of the same name.

title: ONE IN A THOUSAND
synopsis: Dans une cite en Argentine, Iris, 17 ans, est immediatement attiree par Renata, une jeune femme au passe difficile. Elle devra surmonter ses peurs et affronter ses incertitudes si elle veut esperer connaitre son veritable premier amour.

title: VALENTINA
synopsis: A trans girl and her mother move to a new town in order to start fresh, but quickly face dilemmas when the local high school needs a second parental signature for enrollment.

title: MY FIRST SUMMER
synopsis: 16-year-old Claudia has grown up in isolation from the outside world. Stranded on a remote property after her mother's death, she is shocked when Grace, a spirited local teen, appears in the garden like a mirage, a breath of fresh, sugary air. The pair find in each other the support,

title: HER MOTHERS
synopsis: In this intimate tale of love and freedom, a lesbian couple contends with homophobia in an increasingly radicalized Hungary as they struggle to create a family through adoption and to define their roles in motherhood.

title: SCENES I IMAGINE
synopsis: Scenes I Imagine is about the relationships between female characters in productions that were known as "women films" in Turkish cinema in the 1980s and early 90s. Could the deep bonds between women also point to relationships of a sexual and emotional nature that are hidden beneath the surface?

title: TOVE
synopsis: The movie centres on the life of Tove Jansson, showing both her personal relationships, and the creation of the popular Moomin books.

title: AHEAD OF THE CURVE
synopsis: With a fist full of credit cards, a lucky run at the horse track, and a title that called to mind a certain French film star, Franco Stevens launched the best-selling lesbian lifestyle magazine ever published, connecting her community in an unprecedented way. AHEAD OF THE CURVE is a new featur.

title: THE WORLD TO COME
synopsis: Upstate New York, 1850s. Abigail begins a new year on the rural farm where she lives with her husband. Spring arrives and Abigail meets Tallie, a newcomer renting a nearby farm with her husband. The two strike up a tentative relationship, filling a void in their lives which neither knew existed.

title: UN METRE VINGT
director: Maria Belen Poncio, Rosario Perazolo Masjoan
synopsis: Juana, 17 ans, veut vivre sa premiere fois. Et ce n'est pas son fauteuil roulant qui va l'en empecher. Dans son nouveau lycee en Argentine, elle s'engage dans la lutte pour l'education sexuelle et devient une porte-parole.

title: GINNY & GEORGIA
synopsis: Ginny Miller, an angsty fifteen-year-old, often feels more mature than her thirty-year-old mother, the irresistible and dynamic Georgia Miller.

title: RATCHED
synopsis: A young nurse at mental institution becomes jaded, bitter and a downright monster to her patients.

title: ASPHALT GODDESS
synopsis: Max returns to her slum turned into the vocalist of a rock band. There, the memories await, the latest news and the truths that were silent for years: Sonia is a voice that speaks from the death, Ramira and Carcacha regent with the neighborhood s misery, and Guama sinks into madness.

title: THE OWL HOUSE
synopsis: A teenager finds herself stuck in the Demon Realm and battles the forces of evil alongside a rebellious witch and a pint-sized warrior.

title: HIGHTOWN
synopsis: A federal Fishery Service Agent finds herself at the center of Cape Cod's gruesome heroin epidemic after discovering a body in the bay.

title: I AM NOT OKAY WITH THIS
synopsis: Sydney is a teenage girl navigating the trials and tribulations of high school while dealing with the complexities of her family, her budding sexuality, and mysterious superpowers just beginning to awaken deep within her.

title: TWENTIES
synopsis: Hattie, a queer African American woman, hangs out with her two straight best friends, as they all try to make their dreams come true.

title: FEEL GOOD
synopsis: The series follows recovering addict and comedian Mae, who is trying to control the addictive behaviors and intense romanticism that permeate every facet of her life.

title: SELF MADE: INSPIRED BY THE LIFE OF MADAM C.J. WALKER
synopsis: The inspiring story of trailblazing African American entrepreneur Madam C.J. Walker who built a haircare empire that made her America's first female self-made millionaire.

title: DELILAH
synopsis: After a life-changing event, Delilah's first step toward putting her life back together is to introduce herself to a complete stranger who may or may not be her real father.

title: NIMBY: NOT IN MY BACKYARD
synopsis: Mervi is a lesbian living with Kata in Helsinki who are considering coming out of closet. They soon realize that they are not the only ones with secrets.

title: THROUGH THE GLASS DARKLY
synopsis: A year after Charlie's daughter disappears, another girl from Elrod, Georgia goes missing. Convinced there is a connection, Charlie draws suspicion and contempt from local law enforcement and townspeople as she stops at nothing to expose its most devastating and darkest secret.

title: EMILIA
synopsis: After breaking up with her girlfriend, Emilia returns from the city to her village in Patagonia. The calm, unchanging nature of the impressive landscape contrasts with her restless inner life, and the people from her past elicit old emotions and new insights, some of which are not so uplifting.

title: LES SENTIERS DE L'OUBLI
synopsis: Devenue veuve, Claudina quitte la campagne pour rejoindre son petit-fils Cristoban et sa fille Alejandra, avec qui elle s'entend moyen. C'est la a qu'elle fait la connaissance d'Elsa, une femme independante et mariee, dont elle va tomber amoureuse. Une rencontre et une vraie emancipation pour elle.

title: SHIVA BABY
synopsis: No synopsis available

title: TEENAGE BOUNTY HUNTERS
synopsis: After joining forces with a veteran bounty hunter, sixteen-year-old fraternal twin sisters Sterling and Blair dive into the world of bail skipping baddies while still navigating the high stakes of teenage life.

title: MA RAINEY'S BLACK BOTTOM
synopsis: When Ma Rainey, the "Queen of the Blues," makes a record in a studio in Chicago, 1927, tensions boil between her, her white agent and producer, and bandmates.

title: TAHARA
synopsis: At the funeral for a Hebrew school classmate who took her own life, two best friends find themselves distracted by the teenage complications of lust, social status, and wavering faith.

title: UNPREGNANT
synopsis: When her picture-perfect world verges on collapse after discovering she's pregnant, Ivy-League bound Veronica enlists her chaotic ex-BFF Bailey to drive her 1,000 miles to carry out a decision she never imagined she'd have to make.

title: SUMMERLAND
synopsis: A woman during World War II opens her heart to an evacuee after initially resolving to be rid of him.

title: A SECRET LOVE
synopsis: A moving and triumphant love story about two trailblazing women who break barriers and conventional norms, coming out to their conservative families as they face the difficulties of aging.

title: THE OLD GUARD
synopsis: A covert team of immortal mercenaries are suddenly exposed and must now fight to keep their identity a secret just as an unexpected new member is discovered.

title: A NEW YORK CHRISTMAS WEDDING
synopsis: As her Christmas Eve wedding draws near, Jennifer is visited by an angel and shown what could have been if she hadn't denied her true feelings for her childhood best friend.

title: DATING AMBER
synopsis: Two school friends decide to start a pretend straight relationship in an effort to fit in.

title: BIRDS OF PREY ET LA FANTABULEUSE HISTOIRE DE HARLEY QUINN
synopsis: Lorsque la jeune Cassandra Cain tombe sur un diamant appartenant au grand criminel Black Mask, Harley Quinn s'associe a Black Canary, Huntress et Renee Montoya pour l'aider et la proteger.

title: SI TU SAVAIS
synopsis: En acceptant d'ecrire les lettres d'amour d'un camarade, Ellie Chu ne s'attendait pas a tisser des liens avec lui... ni a tomber amoureuse de la fille qu'il aime.

title: LA LEYENDA NEGRA
synopsis: In Compton, a soon-to-be undocumented teenager fights for her right to stay in America while risking her family, her friendships, and her first love.

title: IFE
synopsis: A love story about ife and Adaora, two Nigerian women who fall in love over a three-day date, but their love is soon tested by the realities of being lesbian in Nigeria.

title: COCON
synopsis: Nora grows through observation. Always at her big sister's side, she drifts around the housing blocks and sees people being in love, being high, spiteful and tender. When Nora meets Romy, she suddenly feels trapped in her own skin, and she starts to recognize her true self.

title: KAJILLIONAIRE
synopsis: Le pere, la mere et la fille forment une famille de petits escrocs. Leur relation va s'effilocher lorsqu'une belle inconnue se joint a leur minable existence.

title: HAPPIEST SEASON
synopsis: A young woman with a plan to propose to her girlfriend while at her family's annual holiday party discovers her partner hasn't yet come out to her conservative parents.

title: AMMONITE
synopsis: An acclaimed fossil hunter is forced to care for a rich visitor's sick wife, and the two develop an intense bond that forces the two women to re-examine their relationship.

title: SECOND STAR ON THE RIGHT
synopsis: Emilia is a 30-something bisexual woman who refuses to grow up as her female friends already did. Angelica, one of Emilia's friends, is getting married. Her other friends, Clara and Renata, seem to have all their lives figured out: amazing jobs, family, kids... While Emilia is still living with her

title: BREAKWATER
synopsis: Un groupe d'amis de Sao Paulo part pour une plage eloignee. En attendant le reveillon de la Saint-Sylvestre, ils se creent un environnement sur et agreable fait de musique et d'amitie. Ils prennent soin les uns des autres, assument leurs corps, leurs sexualites, leurs souvenirs et se sentent libres.

title: HOLY TRINITY
synopsis: In this eye-popping, spiritually rollicking film, queer femme dominatrix Trinity huffs a magic aerosol can and develops the ability to speak to the dead. Trinity's submissive trans partner, Baby, is by her side as she journeys in and out of reality on this wild ride of John Waters-style queer spirit

title: BATWOMAN
synopsis: Kate Kane seeks justice for Gotham city as Batwoman.

title: DEAD TO ME
synopsis: A hotheaded widow searching for the hit-and-run driver who mowed down her husband befriends an eccentric optimist who isn't quite what she seems.

title: WORK IN PROGRESS
synopsis: Abby, a 45-year-old self-identified fat, queer dyke whose misfortune and despair unexpectedly lead her to a vibrantly transformative relationship. Chicago improv mainstay Abby McEnany co-created/stars in this uniquely human comedy series.

title: A BLACK LADY SKETCH SHOW
synopsis: A half-hour sketch comedy written by and starring Robin Thede.

title: DEATH WILL COME AND SHALL HAVE YOUR EYES
synopsis: Deux femmes qui ont partage leur vie ensemble sont confrontees a la mort imminente de l'une d'entre elles. Cette derniere refusant de suivre tout traitement, elles choisissent de s'installer dans un petit cottage en foret pour attendre que la mort s'immisce dans leur existence.

title: DEUX
synopsis: Les retraitees Nina et Madeleine ont cache leur passion amoureuse pendant de nombreuses decennies, pour n'etre aux yeux des autres que les voisines des 2 appartements du dernier etage. Leur lien est mis a l'epreuve lorsqu'elles sont tout a coup incapables de se deplacer librement l'une chez l'autre.

title: THE CANCER JOURNALS REVISITED
synopsis: The Cancer Journals Revisited is prompted by the question of what it means to re-visit and re-vision Black lesbian feminist poet Audre Lorde's classic 1980 memoir of her breast cancer experience today.

title: THE L WORD: GENERATION Q
synopsis: Groundbreaking drama series The L Word revolutionized a generation. This fall the highly anticipated sequel The L Word: Generation Q debuts. Returning cast Jennifer Beals, Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey will resume their original roles.

title: GENTLEMAN JACK
synopsis: Anne Lister returns to Halifax, West Yorkshire in 1832, determined to transform the fate of her faded ancestral home Shibden Hall.

title: NICE CHINESE GIRLS DON'T!
synopsis: Nice Chinese Girls Don't! introduces us to Kitty Tsui, a multihyphenate poet-writer-activist-artist-and-bodybuilder who immigrated to San Francisco from China in the Vietnam war era.

title: CHARLIE'S ANGELS
synopsis: Reboot of the 2000 action comedy based on the 1970s TV series.

title: HARLEY QUINN
synopsis: The series will focus on a newly single Harley Quinn, who sets off to make it on her own in Gotham City.

title: BOOKSMART
synopsis: On the eve of their high school graduation, two academic superstars and best friends suddenly realise that they should have worked less and played more. Determined never to fall short of their peers, the girls set out on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.

title: SEX EDUCATION
synopsis: A teenage virgin who lives with his sex therapist mother teams up with a smart and edgy high school classmate to start their own health clinic.

title: SAME BUT DIFFERENT: A TRUE NEW ZEALAND LOVE STORY
synopsis: A True New Zealand Love Story based on Kiwi-Samoan writer/director Nikki Si'ulepa and producer Rachel Aneta Wills' journey in pursuit of true love.

title: BABY JANE
synopsis: Jane, a small-town girl, has moved to Helsinki and the world is finally open for her. Passionate and excited, she seeks adventure, all the things she has yearned for so long. Jane gravitates to a gay bar at night, staggers in her nervous state of mind, and meets Piki, the most dashing butch in town.

title: LOVE, SPELLS AND ALL THAT
synopsis: Eren and Reyhan had a love affair when they were young. Eren is the daughter of a powerful MP while Reyhan is the daughter of the keeper in their summerhouse in Buyukada. Eren returns to the island 20 years later and the story starts at this point.

title: SOMEONE GREAT
synopsis: After a devastating break up on the eve of her cross-country move, Jenny enjoys one last NYC adventure with her two best pals. Someone Great is a romantic comedy about love, loss, growth and the everlasting bond of female friendship.

title: THE ARCHIVETTES
synopsis: This inspiring film profiles the Lesbian Herstory Archives, a non-hierarchical, collectively-run archive that preserves the various expressions of lesbian identity, love, and solidarity.

title: EUPHORIA
synopsis: A look at life for a group of high school students as they grapple with issues of drugs, sex and violence.

title: WELCOME TO THE USA
synopsis: As she waits to return to the U.S. Embassy for her exit visa, a woman shares meals with her elderly mother, has sleepovers with her Muslim convert sister, and reunites with her on-off-girlfriend for what may be the last time.

title: DYKES, CAMERA, ACTION!
synopsis: A history of queer cinema from the women who made it happen.

title: PORTRAIT DE LA JEUNE FILLE EN FEU
synopsis: Marianne, une artiste bretonne du XVIIIe siecle, doit realiser le portrait d'Heloise, la fille d'une comtesse. Mais Heloise resiste a son destin d'epouse en refusant de poser. Marianne va devoir la peindre en secret...

title: VITA AND VIRGINIA
synopsis: It's the fascinating true story about the love affair between socialite and popular author Vita Sackville-West and literary icon Virginia Woolf.

title: ELISA & MARCELA
synopsis: The first same-sex marriage in Spain to take place after the Roman Imperial era occurred on 8 June 1901. Two women, Marcela Gracia Ibeas and Elisa Sanchez Loriga, attempted to get married in A Coruna (Galicia, Spain). To achieve it Elisa had to adopt a male identity: Mario Sanchez.

title: LA FAVORITE
synopsis: Debut du XVIIIe siecle, l'Angleterre et la France sont en guerre. A la cour, c'est la mode des courses de canards & des ananas. La reine Anne, a la sante fragile & au caractere instable, regne sous l'influence de son amie Lady Sarah Churchill. Une nouvelle servante, Abigail Hill arrive a la cour.

title: BLACK LIGHTNING
synopsis: A retired superhero becomes a vigilante for justice.

title: DADDY ISSUES
synopsis: Maya, a 19 year old queer pixie, gets romantically involved with her sexually fluid insta-crush and unknowingly becomes part of a twisted love triangle.

title: BLOCKERS
synopsis: When three parents discover their daughters' pact to lose their virginity at prom, they launch a covert one-night operation to stop the teens from sealing the deal.

title: EVA + CANDELA
synopsis: Eva and Candela face the end of their relationship. They met and fell in love but what brought them together would separate them. Their professional dreams would become their end.

title: HEARTS BEAT LOUD
synopsis: A father and daughter form a unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

title: L'OMBRE D'EMILY

title: MONTANA
synopsis: When a young woman returns to her hometown in Israel following the death of her grandfather, she falls in love with a married teacher despite the looming figure of her fractured past.

title: A WINTER TO REMEMBER
