synopsis: Before leaving for college, a recently dumped goth girl's life changes forever when she falls in love with a smart and professional college grad who is staying in the family's guest house.

title: KYSS MIG - UNE HISTOIRE SUEDOISE
synopsis: En Suede, une famille recomposee : Lasse, le pere de Mia et Oskar, va epouser Elisabeth, la mere de Frida, et organise a cette occasion une fete. Venue de Stockholm ou elle vit avec son fiance depuis plusieurs annees, Mia, qui rend rarement visite a son pere...

title: FOR 80 DAYS
synopsis: 70-year-old Axun doesn't get along with her husband, her daughter, or her friends. She lives out her monotonous days on a farm, until the day she comes across Maite again, someone she hasn't seen for fifty years...

title: JACK & DIANE
synopsis: Le garcon manque Jack et la petillante Diane sont deux adolescentes qui tombent eperdument amoureuses lors d'un ete a New York. Lorsque Diane revele qu'elle doit partir etudier en Europe, Jack tente de repousser Diane. Leur amour naissant et leurs desirs sexuels sont mis a l'epreuve.

title: BYE BYE BLONDIE
synopsis: Gloria et Frances se sont aimees dans la France des annees 80 comme on s'aime a seize ans. Puis la vie, autant que les contraintes sociales, les ont separees. Vingt ans apres, a nouveau, leurs chemins se croisent.

title: EN SECRET
synopsis: Contemporary Iran, the unseen world of youth culture, filled with underground parties, sex, drugs and defiance. Two vivacious young girls-Atafeh and Shireen-are discovering their burgeoning sexuality, struggling with their desires and the boundaries placed upon them by the world they were born into.

title: AMIES POUR LA VIE
synopsis: Yolanda et Mari vivent a Los Angeles. Filles d'immigres latinos, elles n'ont qu'un seul repere sur lequel compter : la famille. L'une collectionne les bonnes notes a l'ecole, tandis que l'autre subvient d'ores et deja a une partie des besoins des siens en travaillant.

title: CODEPENDENT LESBIAN SPACE ALIEN SEEKS SAME
synopsis: A shy greeting card store employee unknowingly falls for a lesbian space alien while two government agents closely track their romance.

title: THE PERFECT FAMILY
synopsis: In this family comedy, a devout Catholic in the running for the coveted Catholic Woman of the Year award must prove that her family actually conforms to the image of "the perfect family" as envisioned by the church, an image she's put forth with considerable effort her whole life.

title: ALBERT NOBBS
synopsis: In nineteenth century Ireland, painfully shy butler Albert Nobbs hides an incredible secret: she poses as a man so she can find work. Terrified that someone will discover her identity, Albert keeps a very low profile, until the arrival of Hubert Page--another woman in her same situation.

title: VOLTIGES
synopsis: No synopsis available

title: LE VOYAGE DE LUCIA
synopsis: No synopsis available

title: JAMIE AND JESSIE ARE NOT TOGETHER
synopsis: From writer/director Wendy Jo Carlton (Hannah Free) comes a lesbian romantic comedy-with musical numbers!-for anyone who has ever fallen for a friend.

title: BUMBLEFUCK, USA
synopsis: Distraught by the suicide of her gay friend Matt, Alexa travels from Amsterdam to her dead friend's small American town, hoping to uncover the reasons that led Matt to take his own life. She arrives with a backpack, her video camera and intentions to make a film...

title: SPORK
synopsis: Junior high isn't easy for anyone-- especially if you're a frizzy-haired, pink-cheeked hermaphrodite like Spork.

title: YOU AND I
synopsis: Two teenage girls, Janie who is American and Lana who is Russian, are a couple of adventurous, creative, and talented wannabe-nihilists who escape their lives of drug addiction and poverty.

title: PARIAH
synopsis: A Bronx lesbian teenager juggles multiple identities to avoid rejection from friends and family, but pressure from home, school, and within corrodes the line between her dual personas with explosive consequences.

title: CLOUDBURST
synopsis: Colloquial humour colours Thom Fitzgerald's romantic comedy about a lesbian couple planning to wed in Canada after more than 30 years together. Oscar-winner Olympia Dukakis shines in this beautiful love story as the defiant and hilariously profane Stella.

title: THREE VEILS
synopsis: A 2011 English language drama film written and directed by Rolla Selbak, starring Sheetal Sheth, Angela Zahra and Mercedes Mason.

title: THE OWLS
synopsis: The Owls est un thriller experimental devoilant l'histoire de deux couples lesbiens d'age mur ayant accidentellement tue une jeune femme et qui tentent de le cacher. Par le realisateur de The Watermelon Woman.

title: NOUS SOMMES LA NUIT
synopsis: Lena, 20 ans, est une marginale qui vit de larcins. Lors d'une de ses virees nocturnes, elle penetre dans un club underground et rencontre Louise, la proprietaire.

title: A MARINE STORY
synopsis: A decorated Marine officer unexpectedly returns home from the war and is quickly recruited to help a troubled teen prepare for boot camp.

title: COMMENT T'OUBLIER?
synopsis: Julia is a 35-year-old English Literature teacher struggling with depression as she tries to get her life back together again after her long, intense love affair with Antonia. Feeling totally abandoned after she and her enigmatic girlfriend broke up, Julia is thrown into a painful process.

title: KABOOM
synopsis: Smith mene une vie tranquille sur le campus - il traine avec sa meilleure amie, l'insolente Stella, couche avec la belle London, tout en desirant Thor, son sublime colocataire, un surfeur un peu simplet - jusqu'a une nuit terrifiante ou tout va basculer.

title: TOUT VA BIEN! THE KIDS ARE ALL RIGHT
synopsis: Maintenant que Joni a l'age legal pour acceder a leur dossier a la banque du sperme, son frere et elle decident de retrouver le donneur dont ils sont tous deux issus. Papa-donneur est rapidement seduit par les deux adolescents qui frappent a sa porte.

title: LES RUNAWAYS
synopsis: In 1970s LA, a tough teenager named Joan Jett connects with an eccentric producer to form an all-girl band that would launch her career and make rock history.

title: DIFFICULT LOVE
synopsis: Difficult Love presents a lively personal take on the challenges facing Black lesbians in South Africa today. It features the life, photographs, work, friends and associates of "visual activist" and renowned photographer, Zanele Muholi (who also narrates the film).

title: ELENA UNDONE
synopsis: Fate brings two diversely different women together, and sets them on a collision course that will shatter their preconceived notions about love, life and the power of one's soul.

title: BLOOMINGTON
synopsis: A young former child actress enrolls in college searching for a new direction in her life. She meets a mysterious teacher that seduces her and an illicit affair is started. But when the former actress receives an offer to return to Hollywood, their relationship is endangered.

title: LE JOURNAL SECRET D'ANNE LISTER
synopsis: 19th century lesbian pioneer Anne Lister is brought vividly to life in this fantastic new drama from the BBC.

title: AND THEN CAME LOLA
synopsis:
Lola, une photographe talentueuse mais tres distraite, est sur le point de tout avoir, l'amour et le travail.
Mais elle peut aussi tout perdre si elle n'arrive pas a temps a une reunion cruciale.

title: ROOM IN ROME
synopsis: Deux etrangeres, une russe et une espagnole, se rencontrent par hasard dans un hotel de Rome. Elles ont une nuit pour faire connaissance. S'ensuit une aventure passionnelle entre les deux jeunes femmes...

title: LA MENTEUSE AUX QUATRE VISAGES
synopsis: A story of love and lies for four twenty-somethings looking to find themselves in New York City.

title: CRACKS
synopsis: In an austere and remote all-girls boarding school, the most elite students are the illustrious members of the schools' diving team. Di, Lily, Poppy, Laurel, Rosie and Fuzzy are the envy of their fellow pupils who watch on as the girls compete for the attention of their glamorous teacher Miss G.

title: ELOISE'S LOVER
synopsis: A young woman is hospitalized and in a coma after a serious accident. Through flashbacks we learn of her feelings for a another woman.

title: THE LAST SECT
synopsis: A vampire hunter tracks female bloodsuckers who use an Internet dating site to lure men and women.

title: CHLOE
synopsis: Catherine, un medecin, soupconne son mari David, un charmant professeur de musique, de la tromper. Pour apaiser ses soupcons et ses craintes, elle engage une jeune femme irresistible, Chloe, pour tester la fidelite de David. Mais des evenements imprevus vont commencer a mettre la famille en danger.

title: BANDAGED
synopsis: A forbidden affair begins between a nurse and the suicidal daughter of a wealthy surgeon whose face has been badly damaged.

title: EL NINO PEZ
synopsis: Lala, une ado des banlieues riches de Buenos Aires, est amoureuse d'Ailin, une domestique paraguayenne. Elles prevoient de voler la famille de Lala pour financer leur reve de vie au Paraguay. Mais lorsqu'Ailin est placee dans un centre pour jeunes delinquants, Lala decide de la sauver.

title: THE WORLD UNSEEN
synopsis: A drama centered on two women who engage in a dangerous relationship during South Africa's apartheid era.

title: DROOL
synopsis: Anora a un mari, deux beaux enfants et un joli pavillon en banlieue. Mais son mari la frappe, et ses enfants l'ignorent. Aussi, lorsque son regard croise celui de sa nouvelle voisine, l'exuberante Imogene, Anora decouvre un nouveau monde plein de possibilites.

title: MISSISSIPPI DAMNED
synopsis: While growing up in rural Mississippi, three children from an impoverished black family with a long history of violence, addiction and abuse separately attempt to escape their suffocating circumstances but encounter devastating setbacks.

title: GLEE
synopsis: A group of ambitious misfits try to escape the harsh realities of high school by joining a glee club, where they find strength, acceptance and, ultimately, their voice, while working to pursue dreams of their own.

title: MY NORMAL
synopsis: Natalie is an attractive New York City lesbian who pays the bills by working as a dominatrix while she pursues her filmmaking ambitions. Her unique talents make her a star in the erotic services trade, and a new romance is showing promise as well.

title: LESBIAN VAMPIRE KILLERS
synopsis: Their women having been enslaved by the local pack of lesbian vampires thanks to an ancient curse, the remaining menfolk of a rural town send two hapless young lads out onto the moors as a sacrifice.

title: VIOLA DI MARE
synopsis: From the novel Minchia di Re by Giacomo Pilati comes a scandal hidden in 19th century Sicily between two young women, Angela and Sara.

title: I CAN'T THINK STRAIGHT
synopsis: When Tala and Leyla meet in London and begin to have feelings for each other, it's a problem. Tala's wealthy Middle Eastern family is currently planning her wedding, while Leyla is dating Tala's male friend.

title: RIPARO
synopsis: Anna et Mara rentrent de voyage et realisent qu'Anis, un jeune immigrant marocain, tente de se cacher dans leur voiture pour passer la frontiere italienne.

title: VAMPIRE DIARY
synopsis: While trolling London's Goth clubs to chronicle a subculture of wannabe vampires, nascent filmmaker Holly meets and falls for smoldering lesbian Vicki -- who turns out to be a bona-fide bloodsucker.

title: AFFINITY
synopsis: When wealthy 19th-century socialite Margaret Prior tries to find purpose in her life by volunteering at a women's prison, she becomes obsessed with one inmate whose gifts for the paranormal hold a special attraction.

title: MEL ET JENNY
synopsis: Mel, une jeune femme garconne, vit dans le plus grand ennui en Allemagne mais reve de voir le monde. Lorsqu'elle est confondue avec un homme, elle se reinvente en Miguel ; un garcon portugais doux et romantique ; et seduit Jenny, une belle adolescente.

title: TICK TOCK LULLABY
synopsis: As their biological clocks tick down, a lesbian couple embarks on a quest for the ideal sperm donor in this well-crafted indie tale from Britain.

title: DE L'AUTRE COTE
synopsis: Malgre les reticences de son fils Nejat, Ali, veuf, decide de vivre avec Yeter, une prostituee d'origine turque comme lui. Mais Nejat, jeune prof d'allemand, se prend d'affection pour Yeter lorsqu'il comprend qu'elle envoie son argent a sa fille en Turquie, pour lui payer des etudes.

title: NAISSANCE DES PIEUVRES
synopsis: Lorsque trois adolescentes de 15 ans venant des banlieues modernes de Paris se croisent a la piscine municipale, l'amour et le desir se revelent dramatiquement. Leurs relations evoluent lentement lorsqu'elle commencent a saisir le sens du desir et le pouvoir de l'attraction sexuelle.

title: CARAMEL
synopsis: A Beyrouth, cinq femmes se croisent regulierement dans un institut de beaute, microcosme colore et sensuel ou plusieurs generations se rencontrent, se parlent et se confient.

title: LOVING ANNABELLE
synopsis: Apres avoir ete une nouvelle fois viree d'un lycee, Annabelle se retrouve dans un pensionnat catholique pour jeunes filles. La directrice demande a Simone, enseignante en litterature, de surveiller de pres cette etudiante sulfureuse qui ne cache pas son attirance pour les femmes.

title: QUATRE MINUTES
synopsis: Traude enseigne le piano (Monica Bleibtreu) et la musique a des femmes en prison. Jenny (Hannah Herzsprung), une des detenues, est destructrice et violente mais etait tres douee au piano. Traude tente de la ramener a la musique et de la guider afin qu'elle puisse participer a un prestigieux concours

title: SOAP
synopsis: Charlotte, jeune femme de 32 ans, peut tout avoir si elle le desire, mais elle ne veut rien de tout cela. Lorsqu'elle se separe de son fiance, Charlotte rencontre Veronica, sa voisine du dessus qui se trouve etre un transsexuel.

title: FABULOUS! L'HISTOIRE DU CINEMA GAY
synopsis: A chronological look at films by, for, or about gays and lesbians in the United States, from 1947 to 2005, Kenneth Anger's Fireworks to Brokeback Mountain Talking heads, anchored by critic and scholar B. Ruby Rich, are interspersed with an advancing timeline and with clips from various films.

title: GRAY MATTERS
synopsis: Sam and Gray are a devoted brother and sister who share a dwelling and a love of many things -- ballroom dancing, 1940s movie musicals and, much to their surprise, strong feelings for an attractive woman.

title: IMPAIR AU MARIAGE
synopsis: When New Yorker Alex goes to South Carolina for her sister Jeannie's wedding, she doesn't want her bigoted family to know about her black, Jewish fiance -- so instead, they arrive at the conclusion that Alex is gay.

title: ITTY BITTY TITTY COMMITTEE
synopsis: High School grad and all American gal, Anna finds her purpose and herself after she hooks up with the radical feminists in The Itty Bitty Titty Committee.

title: PUSINSKY
synopsis: Le debut des vacances. Trois filles, 18 ans et le bac en poche, decident de profiter de leur nouvelle liberte pour rejoindre la Hollande en stop. Rythme par les abus d'alcool, les experiences sexuelles et les exces en tout genre, ce voyage va eprouver leur amitie et reveler leurs differences.

title: SKINS
synopsis: The story of a group of British teens who are trying to grow up and find love and happiness despite questionable parenting and teachers who more want to be friends (and lovers) rather than authority figures. (7 seasons / 61 episodes)

title: THE SECRETS
synopsis: This haunting and lyrical drama explores the place of women and sexuality in Orthodox Judaism. At a Jewish women's seminary in Israel, Naomi, the devout daughter of a rabbi, meets secular roommate Michelle, and the two become fast friends and romantic feelings arise.

title: SPIDER LILIES
synopsis: When Jade, a web-cam girl visits Takeko's tattoo studio she becomes entranced with the image of the spider lily and with Takeko as well.

title: LOVE MY LIFE
synopsis: Ichiko and Eri are two beautiful Japanese Uni students who are in a lesbian relationship. Ichiko comes out to her father who tells her he is also gay and her mother was a lesbian.

title: IMAGINE ME & YOU
synopsis: A newlywed bride becomes infatuated with another woman, who questions her sexual orientation, promoting a stir among the bride's family and friends.

title: LES DELICES DE NINA
synopsis: A feisty young woman returns to Glasgow to run her deceased father's curry house.

title: LA TOURNEUSE DE PAGES
synopsis: Melanie tente le concours d'entree au conservatoire, mais perturbee par la presidente du jury, echoue. Dix ans plus tard, elle rencontre la femme de son patron, une pianiste, qui n'est autre que la presidente du jury de son enfance. Elle devient sa tourneuse de pages.

title: LES FILLES DU BOTANISTE
synopsis: Dans la Chine des annees 80, tous les tabous ne sont pas leves. Min, une jeune orpheline, part faire ses etudes chez un botaniste de renom. Homme secret et pere autoritaire, son professeur vit sur une ile qu'il a transformee en jardin luxuriant. Tres vite, elle tombe amoureuse de sa fille.

title: IN HER LINE OF FIRE
synopsis: When the Vice President's plane goes down near a remote Pacific island, he is kidnapped by rebel forces and held for ransom. It is up to his female Secret Service agent and a press secretary to infiltrate the camp and save him.

title: OUBLIER CHEYENNE
synopsis: Cheyenne, jeune journaliste en fin de droits, decide de quitter Paris pour mener une vie marginale a la campagne. Elle laisse derriere elle la femme qu'elle aime, Sonia, prof de physique- chimie dans un lycee parisien, qui fait tout ce qu'elle peut pour l'oublier. Mais ca n'est pas si facile.

title: A LOVE TO KEEP
synopsis: Teachers Pilar and Elvira fall in love during the final years of Francisco Franco's despotic reign, but their happiness is short-lived in this moving Spanish import.

title: THE GYMNAST
synopsis: When an injury ends her career as a gymnast, Jane falls back into lackluster job and a passionless marriage. That is, until she begins work on an aerial act with another beautiful gymnast and feels the stirrings of unexpected love.

title: RED DOORS
synopsis: Recently retired, Ed Wong longs to break away from the monotony of his daily life, but the outlandish dramas of his daughters Samantha, Julie and Katie make escape difficult for this father of three.

title: UNVEILED
synopsis: Fariba, jeune traductrice Iranienne menacee de mort a cause de son homosexualite, cherche refuge en Allemagne, pays dont elle maitrise parfaitement la langue. Sous une fausse identite, deguisee en homme, elle est placee dans un centre d'hebergement pour refugies.

title: LOVE & SUICIDE
synopsis: When Kaye moves to New Orleans with her family and finds herself friendless in the halls of a new high school, she quickly latches on to the aggressively sexual Emily, whose influence ignites a dangerous passion between them.

title: PUCCINI ET MOI
synopsis: Apres s'etre separee de sa compagne, Allegra se retrouve dans le lit du sympathique professeur Philip, qui quitte Grace pour elle. Mais Allegra s'eprend de Grace au point d'entamer une idylle en parallele, sans savoir qu'il s'agit de la femme avec qui Philip a rompu pour etre avec elle...

title: RENT
synopsis: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

title: MY SUMMER OF LOVE
synopsis: Mona, 16 ans, vit seule avec son frere aine Phil dans un village du Yorkshire. Entre ses aventures sans lendemain et ce frere en pleine crise mystique, elle s'ennuie ferme.

title: THE JOURNEY
synopsis: In Sancharram ("The Journey"), Kiran is mortified by her growing lesbian desire for the effervescent Delilah, in an idyllic Indian village where arranged marriage is the only acceptable form of coupling.

title: NOUS ETIONS LIBRES
synopsis: Gilda shares her Paris apartment with an Irish schoolteacher, Guy Malyon, and Mia, a refugee from Spain. As the world drifts toward war, Gilda defiantly pursues her hedonistic lifestyle and burgeoning career as a photographer, but Guy and Mia feel impelled to join the fight against fascism.

title: THE L WORD
synopsis: Follows the lives and loves of a small, close-knit group of lesbians living in Los Angeles as well as the friends and family members that either support or loathe them.

title: SAVING FACE
synopsis: Lorsque la veuve Hwei-Lan informe son pere qu'elle est enceinte, celui-ci la chasse de Flushing.  Ne sachant ou aller, elle emmenage chez sa fille Wil, medecin a Manhattan, qui ne veut pas de colocataire. Wil, une enfant devouee, decide alors de presenter sa mere a tous les celibataires de la ville.

title: EROS THERAPIE
synopsis: Une mysterieuse maison close vient d'ouvrir et propose des traitements de choc, menes par des dominatrices, "pour soulager tous les problemes de libido".

title: SHE HATE ME
synopsis: Jack, employe d'une entreprise de biotechnologie, est licencie, et declenche une enquete sur les activites de ses patrons. Quand son ancienne petite amie Fatima lui offre de l'argent pour la feconder, elle ainsi que sa nouvelle amie Alex, Jack se lance dans le business de la procreation d'enfants.

title: D.E.B.S.
synopsis: Recruited by the U.S. government for their unique ability to lie, cheat and fight, Amy, Max, Janet and Dominique join an underground academy of secret agents known only as D.E.B.S.

title: APRIL'S SHOWER
synopsis: Love, laughter and friendship take center stage in this touching comedy, in which accomplished chef Alex is consumed with the preparations for the bridal shower she's throwing for her best friend, April.

title: GIRL PLAY
synopsis: Director Gabriel sets the stage for a real-life drama when he casts lesbians Robin and Lacie in his latest play. Robin is in a long-term relationship, and Lacie isn't ready to settle down, but as rehearsals continue the two seem to grow closer.

title: TAKE A DEEP BREATH
synopsis: Sasa, a Belgrade University law student, tells her parents that she and her boyfriend Stefan are moving to Canada. That same night Sasa and Stefan suffer a car accident. Sasa wakes up in hospital and meets Stefan's charming and clever sister Lana, a photographer living in Paris.

title: THIRTEEN
synopsis: L.A. teenager Tracy is an excellent student in her seventh grade class and gets along well with her mother, Melanie. When she befriends Evie, the most popular girl in school, she follows Evie's lead into the harsh realities of sex, drugs, and hard-edged adventure.

title: GOLDFISH MEMORY
synopsis: In this comedy set in contemporary Dublin, Clara is stunned when she finds her boyfriend kissing someone else, setting in motion a string of romantic mishaps for the heartbroken woman and several other lovelorn characters.

title: MIMI
synopsis: Claire Simon's documentary is a collaborative film, an as-told-to autobiography of a woman from Nice whose family was ravaged by the Nazi occupation of France and whose own life, as a young lesbian woman at a time of intolerance, took a lyrical and rustic turn.

title: A FAMILY AFFAIR
synopsis: Dyed-in-the-wool New Yorker Rachel moves to San Diego, where her parents now live, in search of a new life and a new love.

title: FRIDA
synopsis: Salma Hayek stars in this visually-striking biopic about the famed Mexican artist Frida Kahlo, following her rise to fame in the art world as well as her many illicit love affairs with men and women alike.

title: LAUREL CANYON
synopsis: A pair of upper-middle class lovebirds from the East Coast relocate to Los Angeles. Freshly minted from Harvard, Sam and Alex, need some lodging while they hunt for a home. Jane, Sam's estranged, Age-of-Aquarius mom, is more than willing to put the couple up in her lavish digs.

title: TAN DE REPENTE - TOUT A COUP
synopsis: Marcia est une jeune et naive employee dont la vie bascule le jour ou elle rencontre deux inconnues rebelles : Mao et Lenin. Sous l'impulsion de Mao, les deux filles kidnappent Marcia sous la menace d'un couteau et l'entrainent dans un voyage frenetique d'amitie, d'amour et de decouverte de soi.

title: THE HOURS
synopsis: The Hours raconte une journee cruciale des vies respectives de trois femmes de differentes epoques, dont les destins sont interconnectes par le roman de Virginia Woolf, Mrs Dalloway.

title: MA MERE PREFERE LES FEMMES (SURTOUT LES JEUNES...)
synopsis: In this knockabout Spanish comedy, Sofia gets married, builds a successful career as a pianist and is a loving mom to her children, then one day, she wakes up and realizes she's a lesbian.

title: CHOSES SECRETES
synopsis: Two young women enjoy themselves playing games in love and with their fate. Their aim: to conquer men--until the day breaks when their limited experience turns against them.

title: CLARA CET ETE LA
synopsis: Clara and Zoe are excited to be off to summer camp for a week of adventure. Zo quickly hooks up with Sebastien and then is devastated to find he's dating her just to impress his friends. Flighty Zoe then turns to Clara, telling her she loves her.

title: THE ODDS OF RECOVERY
synopsis: After a twenty year period of multiple illnesses and injuries, the filmmaker turns the camera on herself as a way to analyze her chances for a happier, healthier life.

title: SUGAR SWEET
synopsis: Tired of being labeled a sellout by her friends, and hearing complaints about the quality of her work, lesbian porn film director Naomi tries her hand at a female dating show, unaware she's opened the door to pure chaos.

title: LA REPETITION
synopsis: Louise et Nathalie ont une trentaine d'annees. Elles se retrouvent apres une separation de plus de 10 ans. Louise est prothesiste dentaire. Nathalie est devenue comedienne de theatre, ce qu'elles revaient d'etre un jour toutes les deux. Louise ne laisse pas de repit a Nathalie...

title: QUE FAISAIENT LES FEMMES PENDANT QUE L'HOMME MARCHAIT SUR LA LUNE?
synopsis: Allowing her parents to believe that she's attending medical school in Montreal, Sacha (Marie Bunel) is actually spending her time in the arms of another woman, who insists that she come clean with her family. Are Sacha's coming-out fears well-founded, or will honesty be easier than she thought?

title: TREADING WATER
synopsis: Casey has turned away from her family to work as a longshorewoman and live with her social-worker girlfriend, Alex, but when Casey visits home at Christmas, she finds that her family's ways have not changed.

title: MULHOLLAND DRIVE
synopsis: Blonde Betty Elms has only just arrived in Hollywood to become a movie star when she meets an enigmatic brunette with amnesia. Meanwhile, as the two set off to solve the second woman's identity, filmmaker Adam Kesher runs into ominous trouble while casting his latest project.

title: KARMEN
synopsis: Re-working of the Carmen story, with a black Karmen Gei playing out her tragedy amidst the magical and chaotic urbanity of Senegal's capital city. Seducting, provocating, sensual - all the ingredients for a perfect drama. With her charm, Karmen gets out of many situations.

title: STRANGER INSIDE
synopsis: A mother daughter reunion set in the harsh reality of a women's correctional facility.

title: LA TENTATION DE JESSICA
synopsis: A 2001 American independent romantic comedy film, written and co-produced by the film's stars, Jennifer Westfeldt and Heather Juergensen. The film also stars Tovah Feldshuh and is directed by Charles Herman-Wurmfeld. The movie is based on a scene from the 1997 off-Broadway p.

title: DES PARENTS PAS COMME LES AUTRES
synopsis: The product of a gay dad and a lesbian mom, Olympe had an unconventional upbringing. But it didn't pose a problem until one of her classmates started spreading gossip about her family, turning her high school years into sheer hell.

title: LOST AND DELIRIOUS
synopsis: Mouse Bradford vient tout juste d'arriver au college de jeunes filles Prekins. Elle a laisse derriere elle la petite ville qui l'a vue grandir, son pere et sa belle-mere. Mouse est vite adoptee par ses deux compagnes de chambre plus agees, la petillante Paulie a l'esprit vif et la belle Tory.

title: UN AMOUR DE FEMME
synopsis: Jeanne, a beautiful wife and mother, feels herself slipping further into loneliness and isolation every day. Her mainstream existence is crushing her, and her relationship with her husband becomes distant and strained.

title: FORBIDDEN FRUIT
synopsis: Two women from a village in Zimbabwe are in love with each other although one is married.

title: JULIE JOHNSON
synopsis: A woman named Julie Johnson, played by Lili Taylor, attempts to realize the dreams she never knew she had by re-enrolling in school.

title: GAUDI AFTERNOON
synopsis: Barcelona hasn't turned out to be the romantic dreamland fledgling translator Cassandra thought it would be. She's about to return to America when the mysterious Frankie offers her a large sum of money to track down Frankie's missing lover.

title: 101 REYKJAVIK
synopsis: Hlynur, trentenaire au chomage vit toujours chez sa mere et passe sa vie a boire, sortir et multiplier les conquetes. Hormis tout cela, il n'a aucun but dans la vie. Jusqu'au jour ou Lola, une amie de sa mere, arrive pour les fetes de fin d'annee.

title: JOHNNY GREYEYES
synopsis: Imprisoned since the shooting death of her father, Johnny forms a new family and falls in love with her cellmate Lana, and struggles to repair her fractured natural family from within prison walls.

title: 100 GIRLS
synopsis: This refreshing teen comedy from director Michael Davis centers on college freshman Matthew, who finds love in a dorm elevator during a power failure -- only to miss her name, leaving him to sort through 100 ladies to locate the mystery woman.

title: AMOURS MORTELLES
synopsis: Detective Catherine Palmer investigates a series of sexually gruesome serial murders and becomes embroiled in a world of lesbianism and bondage after she becomes obsessed with one of the victims' paramours.

title: IF THESE WALLS COULD TALK 2
synopsis: Semi-follow up of the first If These Walls Could Talk with three segments set in the same house, but with different occupants which spans nearly 40 years. While the first film delt with women and the topic of abortion, this deals with women and the topic of lesbianism.

title: CIRCLE INTIME
synopsis: When a poetry student named Mickey disappears in Sydney, Australia, her hire Jill, a lesbian private investigator, to find her. The case plunges Jill deep into Sydney's poetry scene, where she meets and falls for Diana, a poetry lecturer who also happens to be one of Jill's suspects.

title: THE TRUTH ABOUT JANE
synopsis: Jane, a teenager, tries to deal with the realization that she is a lesbian after an intense friendship with another girl leads to her first sexual experience. Jane's mother, Janice, struggles with the revelation of her only daughter's sexuality.

title: THE GIRL
synopsis: A torrid affair between two women, a struggling artist and a flame-haired blues singer, upsets a man who has a thing for the girl.

title: LOVE/JUICE
synopsis: A sympathetic portrayal of an adolescent high school student's emerging homosexual feelings for his best friend, Kaze Shindo's feature debut Love/Juice is a fresh-faced take on the conflicts between friendship and sexual desire.

title: BUT I'M A CHEERLEADER
synopsis: Megan est une lyceenne typiquement americaine qui aime le cheerleading et sort avec un footballeur. Sa paisible existence est bouleversee lorsque sa famille, la soupconnant d'etre lesbienne, l'envoie dans un << camp therapeutique >> ou elle remettra en question sa sexualite pour la premiere fois.

title: TWO BRIDES AND A SCALPEL: DIARY OF A LESBIAN MARRIAGE
synopsis: The true story of "boy meets girl, boy marries girl, boy becomes girl".

title: MEMENTO MORI
synopsis: Deux collegiennes coreennes tiennent un journal intime bien particulier. Leur amitie amoureuse va provoquer des horreurs au sein meme de l'etablissement. Des meurtres vont etre commis.

title: EMPORTE-MOI
synopsis: Hanna a 13 ans et l'annee 1963 sera celle ou tout se decide. Entre un pere juif apatride, une mere catholique, un frere aine tendre et complice, une amie douce et differente et son professeur d'ecole a la troublante ressemblance avec Nana, Hanna s'eveille au monde.

title: HIGH ART
synopsis: A young female intern at a small magazine company becomes involved with a drug-addicted lesbian photographer, both of whom seek to exploit each other for their respective careers, while slowly falling in love with each other.

title: MEILLEUR QUE LE CHOCOLA
synopsis: Deux jeunes et seduisantes lesbiennes, Maggie et Kim, font connaissance a Vancouver, developpent un amour passionne et emmenagent ensemble. cependant, la mere de Maggie, Lila, adorable mais naive, divorce et demenage a Vancouver et rejoins la maison.

title: AIMEE & JAGUAR
synopsis: In 1943, while the Allies are bombing Berlin and the Gestapo is purging the capital of Jews, a dangerous love affair blossoms between two women (Juliane Kohler, Maria Schrader).

title: CHUTNEY POPCORN
synopsis: When Reena learns that married sister Sarita can't have a baby, she decides to play surrogate mother, but Reena's girlfriend worries that three might be a crowd.

title: NOT ALL DADS PEE STANDING UP
synopsis: Zoe et Dan s'aiment. Elles vivent heureuses avec Simon, leur fils de 10 ans, pres de Bruges. Meme la mere de Zoe a fini par s'accommoder de la situation et vient desormais rendre visite a son petit-fils. L'arrivee de nouveaux voisins va bouleverser ce bonheur.

title: FUCKING AMAL
synopsis: Elin, jeune fille de quinze ans, s'ennuie et trouve sa vie morne dans une ville suedoise en depit des dizaines de garcons qui sont amoureux d'elle. Elle se lie d'amitie avec Agnes, plus timide, que l'on dit lesbienne. Elin va peu a peu se sentir attiree par elle.

title: ANATOMIE D'UN TOP MODEL
synopsis: Gia Marie CARANGI est nee a Philadelphie en 1960. Au debut des annees quatre-vingt, elle est devenue une legende dans l'industrie de la mode. Les amours, la drogue, entrainent la top model vers un destin tragique.

title: INTIMATES
synopsis: Foon escapes an arranged marriage by walking the road of a Ji Sor. After an affair with Shing, she becomes pregnant. An attempted abortion nearly costs Foon her life. Wan, the owner of a silk factory, rescues her. Wan and Foon share their romances, reflecting the experience of women during the 40's.

title: CHASING AMY
synopsis: The third installment in the "New Jersey Trilogy" from award-winning writer-director Kevin Smith, Chasing Amy follows comic-book artist Holden as he falls in love with fellow artist Alyssa, only to be thwarted by her sexuality, the disdain of his best friend Banky, and misgivings about himself.

title: IT'S IN THE WATER
synopsis: A new AIDS hospice sends a tiny Southern town into a hysterical homophobic frenzy, and the locals start heeding rumors that the facility has tainted the town's water supply with something that "turns" people gay.

title: FIRE
synopsis: At the insistence of Ashok and their mother, Biji, agrees to marry the beautiful Sita in an arranged marriage, although he is actually in love with Julie, a Chinese-Indian...

title: ALL OVER ME
synopsis: Claude et Ellen sont deux jeunes adolescentes, amies depuis l'enfance. Claude est discrete, peu bavarde, boulimique et en retrait alors qu'Ellen est belle, anorexique, populaire et adepte de nouvelles experiences. Leur relation, au fil de nouvelles rencontres va se degrader...

title: FOXFIRE
synopsis: A mysterious drifter enters the lives of four high school girls, who otherwise don't know one another, and help them fight back against the constant sexual harassment from their teachers and classmates.

title: MURDER AND MURDER
synopsis: Sometimes uncomfortable, always emotionally courageous and intellectually challenging, MURDER and murder is at once soap opera, black comedy, love story, and political meditation.

title: THE WATERMELON WOMAN
synopsis: Cheryl, an aspiring black lesbian filmmaker working in a video store, is making a documentary about a black actress from the 1930s who was typecast, credited only as "the watermelon woman." While uncovering the meaning of her life, Cheryl simultaneously experiences an upheaval in her own.

title: THE INCREDIBLY TRUE ADVENTURE OF TWO GIRLS IN LOVE
synopsis: The story of two girls, Randy and Evie. Randy is a low economic class lesbian living with other lesbians including her aunt. Evie is a wealthy, popular girl with a boyfriend. When Evie befriends Randy, she begins to feel a passion for her she's never felt before.

title: BOUND
synopsis: Quand Violet apercoit Corky dans un ascenseur, l'attraction est immediate. Violet est la petite amie du gangster Caesar tandis que Corky, sortie de prison il y a peu, renove l'appartement voisin. Les deux femmes, desormais passionnement liees, elaborent un plan qui vise a liberer Violet de Caesar.

title: HIDE AND SEEK
synopsis: Mixes documentary interviews of memories of lesbian adolescence with the story of the 12-year-old girl Lou discovering her sexuality in 1960s America.

title: BUTTERFLY KISS
synopsis: Eunice is walking along the highways of northern England from one filling station to another. She is searching for Judith, the woman, she says to be in love with.

title: LATE BLOOMERS
synopsis: High School basketball coach, Dinah Groshardt, falls for the school secretary, Carly Lumpkin, and upsets the entire school in the process.

title: LE PRIX A PAYER
synopsis: All have suffered that what they did was wrong and one loses all her friends that passed on the money they have stolen.

title: EDIE & THEA: A VERY LONG ENGAGEMENT
synopsis: After 42 years, feisty and delightful lesbian couple Edie and Thea are finally getting married.

title: FEMALE PERVERSIONS
synopsis: Female Perversions concerns Eve (Tilda Swinton), a dynamic powerhouse of a district attorney, fresh from an impressive courtroom victory over a sleazy businessman and on the verge of her greatest triumph, a governor's appointment as a judge.

title: LISTENING FOR SOMETHING... ADRIENNE RICH AND DIONNE BRAND IN CONVERSATION
synopsis: In this film through conversation and poetry two poets meet for the telling and the listening.

title: LOVE AND OTHER CATASTROPHES
synopsis: A day in the life of two film-school students trying to find love and another house-mate.

title: ANTONIA ET SES FILLES
synopsis: In an anonymous Dutch village, a sturdy, strong-willed matriarch looks back upon her life, the generations of family and friends gathered around her table, and ponders the cyclical nature of time.

title: MURIEL FAIT LE DESESPOIR DE SES PARENTS
synopsis: Muriel, discrete et solitaire, tombe amoureuse de Nora, une jeune femme exuberante et rayonnante. Elle decide de se confier a sa mere, qui supporte mal cette realite. Alors que Nora semble encore hesitante sur la nature de ses sentiments, elles decident d'aller passer quelques jours a la mer...

title: QUAND TOMBE LA NUIT
synopsis: Camille travaille comme professeur de mythologie dans un college protestant ultra-conservateur. Elle sort depuis trois ans avec Martin, un theologien, mais le seul veritable amour de sa vie n'est autre que son chien Bob.

title: GAZON MAUDIT
synopsis: After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them.

title: CELLULOID CLOSET
synopsis: L'homosexualite vue a travers cent ans de cinema hollywoodien. Pour les auteurs "The Celluloid Closet" montre comment notre attitude envers l'homosexualite et notre perception des roles des deux sexes ont evolue au cours de ce siecle.

title: THE BODY OF A POET: A TRIBUTE TO AUDRE LORDE
synopsis: An expressive imaginary biography of Audre Lorde- African American, lesbian, feminist, professor, mother, visionary and 'warrior poet' - who died of breast cancer, metastasised to her liver, in 1992.

title: HIGHER LEARNING
synopsis: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

title: CREATURES CELESTES
synopsis: L'amitie irrepressible et passionnee de deux jeunes filles, que rien ne pourra alterer. Pas meme leur entourage, inquiet de leur relation qui les coupe du monde...

title: GO FISH
synopsis: Max is a trendy, pretty, young lesbian, who is having trouble finding love. A friend sets her up with Ely, whom Max likes, but Ely is frumpy, homely, and older. Nor do they have much in common. Can Max learn to look past the packaging?

title: BAR GIRLS
synopsis: Stood up yet again at Los Angeles' Girl Bar by her gorgeous but flaky girlfriend, successful TV cartoon writer Loretta fears she may never find her soul mate. But then in walks Rachael, an aspiring actress who more than catches Loretta's eye.

title: GIRLFRIENDS
director: Mark Steven Bosko, Wayne Alan Harold
synopsis: A lesbian couple support themselves by picking up guys with money and blowing them away. They yearn for a more normal life, so they vow to get out of the murder/theft business and live off welfare money and turning tricks.

title: RULES OF THE ROAD
synopsis: Sensitive and entertaining story about a relationship told through the vehicle the couple shared for many years.

title: THE LESBIAN AVENGERS EAT FIRE, TOO
synopsis: This film documents the first year of actions by The Lesbian Avengers, a group of bold and brazen New York City activists fighting for recognition and equal rights for lesbians everywhere. We recruit!

title: DESPERATE REMEDIES
synopsis: Set in the mythical seaport of Hope sometime during the 19th century, a beautiful merchant hires a handsome but penniless immigrant to seduce her opium-addicted sister away from her sinister paramour.

title: CHICKS IN WHITE SATIN
synopsis: A 1994 English language documentary directed by Elaine Holliman. It has been nominated for 1 award.

title: EVEN COWGIRLS GET THE BLUES
synopsis: Gus Van Sant's film adaptation of Tom Robbins' cult novel, first published in 1976, recounting the misadventures of a beautiful young woman, Sissy Hankshaw (Uma Thurman), whose over-sized thumbs establish her as a very formidable hitchhiker.

title: IN THE BEST INTEREST OF THE CHILDREN
synopsis: Fact-based story of a legal battle fought over custody of five siblings.

title: FORBIDDEN LOVE: THE UNASHAMED STORIES OF LESBIAN LIVES
synopsis: This Canadian documentary chronicles the heyday of Lesbian-oriented pulp romantic fiction in the 1950s, an era when titles such as "Odd Girl Out" spoke volumes to the isolated and confused young lesbians of the era.

title: NITRATE KISSES
synopsis: Essay documentary explores eroded emulsions and images for lost vestiges of lesbian and gay culture. First feature by a pioneer of lesbian cinema, Hammer weaves gay and lesbian couples with footage that unearths the forbidden and invisible history of a marginalized people.

title: CLAIRE OF THE MOON
synopsis: Female authors gather at a small northern coastal retreat to work on their writing skills. A first-time guest who lives for the moment finds herself struggling with her sexuality after discovering her roommate is a lesbian.

title: SALMONBERRIES
synopsis: A woman who grew up in a small town in Alaska goes to the public library to try and find out who her parents were...

title: VANILLA SEX
synopsis: A short exploring what the term 'Vanilla Sex' means in black and queer communities through polaroid photographs.

title: BEIGNETS DE TOMATES VERTES
synopsis: Une femme au foyer decue par la vie se prend d'affection pour une vieille dame dans une maison de soins infirmiers. Au fil de ses visites, elle l'ecoute avec enthousiasme raconter les differentes anecdotes de sa jeunesse et lui parler des gens qu'elle a connus dans sa vie.

title: THE TWIN BRACELETS
synopsis: A Chinese woman (Chen Te Jung) plots murder and suicide when her female companion (Hsiao-hui Liu) is pushed into an arranged marriage.

title: A PLACE OF RAGE
synopsis: This exuberant celebration of African American women and their achievements features interviews with Angela Davis, June Jordan and Alice Walker.

title: THELMA & LOUISE
synopsis: Thelma, une femme au foyer modeste, rejoint son amie Louise, une serveuse independante, pour une petite partie de peche. Cependant, leur voyage se transforme en une cavale lorsque Louise abat un homme qui tente de violer Thelma dans un bar. Louise s'enfuit au Mexique, et Thelma decide de la suivre.

title: FIRST COMES LOVE
synopsis: First Comes Love consists of perfectly choreographed scenes of four wedding ceremonies accompanied by a complex medley of popular love songs.

title: MY OWN PRIVATE IDAHO
synopsis: Mike et Scott vivent parmi les marginaux de Portland, partageant leur solitude, les drogues et les hommes ou femmes a qui ils se vendent. Mike est introverti, homo et souffre de crises de narcolepsie. Enfant abandonne, il est obsede par l'idee de retrouver sa mere.

title: SHE DON'T FADE
synopsis: Chronicles the sexual pursuits of Shae Clarke, an African American lesbian.

title: KHUSH
synopsis: KHUSH means ecstatic pleasure in Urdu. For South Asian lesbians and gay men in Britain, North America, and India (where homosexuality was recently legalised (2018) ) the term captures the blissful intricacies of being queer and of color.

title: ORANGES ARE NOT THE ONLY FRUIT
synopsis: Teenaged Jess is dominated by her religious fanatic mother as she grows up in Lancashire during the 1960's. But this doesn't stop her from beginning to explore her own sexuality.

title: SINK OR SWIM
synopsis: A contemporary classic and a landmark in autobiographical filmmaking, SINK OR SWIM is an unflinching account of the highly charged relationship between a daughter and her father.

title: THANK YOU AND GOOD NIGHT
synopsis: Director Jan Oxenberg's personal documentary about aging and death and how it effects her family.

title: PRIVILEGE
synopsis: Yvonne Rainer's sixth feature is a genuinely subversive movie about menopause. Out of a subject that has been virtually invisible on film, Rainer has fashioned a witty, risky work about sexual identity and the unequal economies of race, gender and class.

title: PORTRAIT OF A MARRIAGE
synopsis: Melodrama detailing the real-life love affair between feminist writer Vita Sackville-West and novelist Violet Keppel against the backdrop of post-World War I England and opposition by Vita's politician husband Harold Nicolson.

title: TINY AND RUBY: HELL DIVIN' WOMEN
synopsis: Profiling legendary jazz trumpeter Tiny Davis and her partner of over 40 years, drummer-pianist Ruby Lucas, Tiny & Ruby: Hell Divin' Women weaves together rare jazz recordings, live performances, vintage photographs, and narrative poetry by Cheryl Clarke.

title: CHOPPER CHICKS IN ZOMBIETOWN
synopsis: George Romero, move over! It's a distaff version of Day of the Dead when a gang of chick motorbikers become the only thing that stands between a crowd of homicidal zombies and a fast-dwindling band of townspeople fighting to stay alive.

title: JOHANNA D'ARC OF MONGOLIA
synopsis: The city comes closer. The bright and shiny white felt yurts with collar-shaped chimney openings are on wagons pulled by twenty-two oxen each in two rows of eleven oxen. The broad front of the city advances ever nearer.

title: VIRGIN MACHINE
synopsis: A German woman travels to San Francisco to find her mother, but winds up distracted by the sexually flamboyant culture of the city.

title: LE JUPON ROUGE
synopsis: Shifting attractions are played out between three women of different ages in this French twist to the typical lesbian drama.

title: THE ICE PALACE
synopsis: A couple of twelve-year-old Norwegian girls struggle with their intense, taboo relationship during the 1930s.

title: LE CHANT DES SIRENES
synopsis: Polly, secretaire interimaire, est fascinee par sa nouvelle patronne, Gabrielle, directrice d'une galerie d'art de Toronto. Tres naive, Polly se trouve souvent confrontee a des comportements intellectuels qui la depassent au sein de la sphere artistique.

title: DAMNED IF YOU DON'T
synopsis: Beautifully shot in black and white, it blends conventional narrative technique with impressionistic camerawork, symbols and voiceovers to create an intimate study of sexual expression and repression.

title: ANNE TRISTER
synopsis: A Swiss Jewish artist who is grieving her father, moves to Montreal and forms a friendship with a child psychiatrist. While creating an installation in an abandoned warehouse, she confronts her past and is increasingly drawn to her friend.

title: NOLA DARLING N'EN FAIT QU'A SA TETE
synopsis: When it comes to love, Nola Darling has got a problem: she's just gotta have "it." And she's having a hard time deciding who'll give "it" the best, choosing between a romantic-but-possessive nice guy,  a flashy-but-vain fashion model, and a fast-riding but faster-talking bicyclist...

title: SEDUCTION: THE CRUEL WOMAN
synopsis: A Film by Elfi Mikesch & Monika Treut. Wanda, a dominatrix who runs an S&M gallery on the Hamburg waterfront, must choose between her lesbian lover and an American trainee.

title: NOVEMBER MOON
synopsis: To escape the escalating Nazi threat in her native Germany, young Jew November Messing finds sanctuary and love with a daring mademoiselle.

title: LA COULEUR POURPRE
synopsis: C'est l'histoire de Celie, une jeune femme noire au debut du 20eme siecle, d'abord violee par son pere puis mariee a "Mister", un fermier brutal et machiste. Au long de sa vie, elle va finir par se familiariser avec le feminisme et s'affirmer face a "Mister".

title: BEYOND THE WALLS
synopsis: Adaptation of the novel of the same name about lesbian love between two nuns in a 16th century Spanish convent.

title: THE TIES THAT BIND
synopsis: This educational film features one woman's recollections of growing up in Nazi Germany. This was filmed by her daughter.

title: DESERT HEARTS
synopsis: While waiting for her divorce papers, a repressed professor of literature is unexpectedly seduced by a carefree, spirited young lesbian.

title: LA REINE CHRISTINE
synopsis: Queen Christina of Sweden is a dominant European ruler in the 17th century, and has never thought of romance. However, she accidentally and secretly falls in love with an emissary from Spain, even though a marriage between the two seems out of the question.

title: LA PIRATE
synopsis: Story of the tangled emotional relationships between five people, which results in argument and violence.

title: LIANNA
synopsis: Lianna is the young wife of a professor. When she becomes angry with her husband for his unabashed infidelities, Lianna has an affair with a woman named Ruth. Once the affair becomes public, Lianna is ostracized by her friends and family.

title: RAZIA SULTAN
synopsis: The film is based on the life of Razia Sultan (1205-1240), the only female Sultan of Delhi (1236-1240) and her speculated love affair with the Abyssinian slave, Jamal-ud-Din Yakut. -- wikipedia.org.

title: COUP DE FOUDRE
synopsis: L'histoire decrit la rencontre puis l'amitie entre deux femmes que tout oppose, l'une artiste tourmentee, l'autre petite bourgeoise conformiste aux reves imprecis, au lendemain d'une Seconde Guerre mondiale lourde de drames intimes pour les deux femmes, amitie qui fera exploser le couple de chacune.

title: UN AUTRE REGARD
synopsis: Political and sexual repression in Hungary, just after the revolution of 1956. In 1958, the body of Eva Szalanczky, a political journalist, is discovered near the border. Her friend Livia is in hospital with a broken neck; Livia's husband, Donci, is under arrest.

title: BUT NO ONE
synopsis: A dream that was "left over" from Gently Down the Stream. Like many dreams, it transformed the familiar world into something more disturbing, contradictory and amoral.

title: GENTLY DOWN THE STREAM
synopsis: Gently Down the Stream is constructed from fourteen dreams taken from eight years' worth of my journals. The text is scratched directly on to the film so that you hear your own voice as you read.

title: AFTERNOON BREEZES
synopsis: An early lesbian-themed Japanese film, and indie legend Hitoshi Yazaki's feature debut.

title: PEPI, LUCI, BOM ET LES AUTRES FILLES DU QUARTIER
synopsis: Pepi qui cultive de la marijuanna dans des pots sur son balcon est decouverte par un flic qui la fait chanter, la viole et la deflore. Pour se venger Pepi decide de seduire Luci, la femme du policier, femme au foyer devouee et soumise.

title: GARCONNE
synopsis: Cebe is a teenage rebel obsessed with Elvis. Her father is in prison after drunkenly smashing his rig into a school bus, and her mother is a junkie waitress. With Don's release, the family struggles to reconnect and the trauma of the past looms large as dark secrets slowly begin to emerge.

title: SCAR TISSUE
synopsis: Simple but intriguing essay on the contrasts and details of the body's social behavior, made from ephemeral fragments of image.

title: MANHATTAN
synopsis: Les angoisses et hesitations sentimentales d'un intellectuel new-yorkais. Apres Annie Hall pour lequel il a recu un Oscar, Woody Allen continue a explorer ses obsessions romantiques a travers Manhattan.

title: A WOMAN LIKE EVE
synopsis: Eva, a young mother of two, is sent on holiday to the South of France by her husband to relieve her stress. There she meets free-spirited feminist and lesbian Liliane who lives in a commune. Eva feels strangely drawn to Liliane.

title: COOL HANDS, WARM HEART
synopsis: The film begins with a series of events on a crowded outdoor market street. Women on stages perform "private" rituals: shaving legs and armpits...

title: DOUBLE STRENGTH
synopsis: Barbara Hammer interviews a lesbian couple, both gymnasts and performance artists and photographs them doing their routines in the nude.

title: MADAME X: AN ABSOLUTE RULER
synopsis: On the women's ship Orlando the flags of attack, leather, weapons, lesbian love and death are raised with a beauty which dispenses with a total domination of the viewer's gaze. The aesthetic is strictly stylized, exhibiting itself without overwhelming us.

title: A QUESTION OF LOVE
synopsis: A housewife (Rowlands) fights to keep custody of her child after her husband, who has moved out, learns she is having a sexual relationship with another woman now residing in the household where the child is still cared for. *Made for television.

title: LES RENDEZ-VOUS D'ANNA
synopsis: In one of Akerman's most penetrating character studies, Anna, an accomplished filmmaker, makes her way through a series of European cities to promote her latest movie. Via a succession of eerie, exquisitely shot, brief encounters, we come to see her emotional and physical detachment from the world.

title: BILITIS
synopsis: Bilitis est eleve dans un internat. Peu avant les vacances d'ete, qu'elle passe chez son amie Melissa, qui est mariee, elle est tombee amoureuse d'un photographe.

title: MULTIPLE ORGASM
synopsis: A hand plays with a vagina as the same scene drifts over a sea of erotic rock formations.

title: WOMEN I LOVE
synopsis: A series of cameo portraits of the filmmaker's friends and lovers intercut with a playful celebration of fruits and vegetables pixilated in nature. Culminating footage evokes a tantric painting of sexuality sustained.

title: A COMEDY IN SIX UNNATURAL ACTS
synopsis: In this witty Hollywood send-up, Jan Oxenberg satirizes a variety of film genres and the ways in which they perpetuate lesbian stereotypes.

title: JE TU IL ELLE
synopsis: In her sexually provocative first feature, Chantal Akerman stars as a nameless, rootless young woman who leaves self-imposed isolation to embark on a road trip that leads to lonely love affairs.

title: HOME MOVIE
synopsis: Using her family's home movies and her talent for parody, Jan Oxenberg gives herself a cheerful lesbian childhood.

title: DYKETACTICS
synopsis: Le premier film d'ebats amoureux lesbiens realise par une lesbienne, Dyketactics revele le sens esthetique de Hammer reliant la vue et le toucher. Une << publicite lesbienne >> sensorielle en 110 images et 4 minutes.

title: LES LARMES AMERES DE PETRA VON KANT
synopsis: Styliste de mode reputee arrogante, cinglante et contente d'elle, Petra von Kant est dans une relation SM plutot satisfaisante avec Marlene, son assistante. Mais lorsqu'elle developpe une obsession pour Karin, une mannequin, les choses se compliquent et l'amour vient alors s'entremeler a la haine.

title: CLEOPATRA JONES AND THE CASINO OF GOLD
synopsis: When fellow operatives and friends disappear during a mission in Hong Kong, Cleopatra Jones comes to help. She discovers the disappearance involves The Dragon Lady, a feared lipstick lesbian who runs a casino and the local drug trade.

title: LES LEVRES ROUGES
synopsis: On their way to England, newlyweds rest at a posh French hotel. They find a stunning red-lipped woman who, despite her age, the hotel owner swears was there 40 years ago. When she introduces herself as Countess of Bathory, everyone is taken aback.

title: VAMPYROS LESBOS
synopsis: Linda is a young American lawyer, working in a law office in Istanbul. During the night, she has passionate dreams in which a sexy brunette harasses, and makes love to her, from which she's unable to defend herself.

title: AI NU, ESCLAVE DE L'AMOUR
synopsis: No synopsis available

title: LE VENIN DE LA PEUR
synopsis: Les reves d'une jeune femme de la haute bourgeoisie sont peuples de fantasmes sado-erotiques, tandis que sa voisine organise des orgies. Elles sont bientot accusees d'assassinat.

title: BERLIN AFFAIR
synopsis: Spy suspense drama set in 1960's Berlin. Intrigue and double-cross lead Killian on a twisting path through love and loss.

title: DADDY, DARLING
synopsis: At the onset of her sexual awakening, 19-year-old Danish teen Katja walks in on her father and new stepmother during sex. Hurt and hungry for revenge, Katja embarks on a lurid scheme to discredit her stepmom and reclaim her father's attentions.

title: LA RESIDENCE
synopsis: Lilli Palmer owns and runs a school for wayward girls in France. Her absolute discipline has fostered a social order among the girls with rampant sex, lesbianism and torture the norm. Palmer also has an adolescent son she tries to keep isolated from the young women.

title: THAT TENDER TOUCH
synopsis: When Terri marries and moves to the suburbs, her lesbian lover, Marsha, doesn't take kindly to Terri's desire for a "normal" life. Determined to win her love back, Marsha worms her way into the newlyweds' happy heterosexual home.

title: FAUT-IL TUER SISTER GEORGE?
synopsis: George lives with her lover, Childie and plays a cheerful district nurse in a BBC soap opera. However, her character is to be killed off. Her life begins to fall apart as Childie has an affair with a predatory TV producer.

title: THERESE ET ISABELLE
synopsis: Two young girls experience awakening sexuality in the heated atmosphere of a Swiss girls' boarding school.

title: DAUGHTERS OF LESBOS
synopsis: Exploitative look at a secret lesbian club.

title: LES BICHES
synopsis: A Paris, la bourgeoise Frederique rencontre Why, une etudiante qu'elle seduit et emmene passer l'hiver dans sa villa de Saint-Tropez. La-bas, Paul, un architecte, s'eprend de Why ; par jalousie, Frederique ira le seduire lui aussi, mais finira par tomber reellement amoureuse de lui...

title: WAVELENGTH
synopsis: Michael Snow's cardinal avant-garde short Wavelength is a 45 minute zoom in on a photograph on a wall in a dank domestic space, interspersed with an occasional foray into a crime scene (or is it just a death?) that occurs immaterially inside of the room.

title: PERSONA
synopsis: Les relations entre une actrice soudain frappee de mutisme et son infirmiere. Un processus d'osmose des personnalites va contribuer a la guerison de la comedienne, mais renforcera peut-etre la solitude de l'infirmiere.

title: CHAINED GIRLS
synopsis: No synopsis available

title: OLGA'S HOUSE OF SHAME
synopsis: No synopsis available

title: LE SILENCE
synopsis: Ester et Anna sont soeurs. Accompagnees de Johann, le jeune fils d'Anna, elles traversent un pays qui leur est etranger et qui, semble-t-il, est en etat de siege. La maladie d'Ester les oblige a faire une halte dans un hotel.

title: LES ABYSSES
synopsis: A bourgeois family, who is harassed and humiliated, ruins their young maids without pay for several years.

title: LA MAISON DU DIABLE
synopsis: An anthropologist with an interest in psychic phenomena takes two specially selected women to a reportedly haunted mansion. Joined by the cynical mansion's heir, they are immediately overwhelmed by strange sounds and events, and come to believe the house is alive.

title: LA RUE CHAUDE
synopsis: At the Doll House, a 1930's New Orleans bordello, Hallie is the main attraction both for clients and for Jo, the madame. Her comfortable if tedious life is disrupted by the arrival in town of Dove Linkhorn, her true love of three years before who is now searching for her.

title: LA RUMEUR
synopsis: A private school for young girls is scandalized when one spiteful student, Mary Tilford, accuses the two young women who run the school of having a lesbian relationship.

title: JEUNES FILLES EN UNIFORME
synopsis: No synopsis available

title: LA BLONDE DU FAR-WEST
synopsis: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

title: OLIVIA
synopsis: Nouvelle pensionnaire d'une institution francaise, la jeune Anglaise Olivia trouble Mademoiselle Julie, professeur de litterature qui, elle-meme, trouble habituellement toutes ses eleves. Mademoiselle Julie a une soeur, Mademoiselle Clara, qui l'accuse de rendre vicieuses toutes les eleves.

title: CAGED
synopsis: Caged, considered the best woman's prison film ever made, represents a union between realistic socially conscious drama and the more stylized world of film noir.

title: LA FONTAINE D'ARETHUSE
synopsis: Dans un train, un couple evoque ses histoires amoureuses passees, et la difficulte a vivre ensemble...

title: CLUB DE FEMMES
synopsis: In a women only boarding house in Paris, impressionable young women are offered cheap accommodation and sanctuary from corrupting male influences.  Unfortunately, this is not the quite the haven of happiness it should be.

title: LA FIANCEE DE FRANKENSTEIN
synopsis: Devant les menaces du Docteur Pretorius le Docteur Frankenstein est oblige de fabriquer une compagne au monstre qu'il a cree et qui seme la terreur dans toute la region. Mais la creature prend peur en voyant le monstre.

title: HUIS CLOS
synopsis: Un groupe de damnes arrive aux portes de l'Enfer: un hotel desuet. Trois d'entre eux sont enfermes dans un meme salon. La haine les divise: Pour l'Eternite, l'Enfer psychologique.

title: CORONATION STREET
synopsis: Life for the residents of a street in Weatherfield, a fictional area of Manchester.

title: LA CHAMBRE INDISCRETE
synopsis: Jane, a young French woman, pregnant and unmarried, takes a room in a seedy London boarding house, inhabited by an assortment of misfits. She considers getting an abortion, but is unhappy with this solution, and starts a relationship with Toby, a struggling young writer who lives on the first floor.

title: LOVE
synopsis: The battle of the sexes and relationships among the elite of Britain's industrial Midlands in the 1920s. Gerald  and Rupert  are best friends who fall in love with a pair of sisters Gudrun, a sculptress and Ursula, a schoolteacher. Rupert marries Ursula, Gerald begins a love affair with Gudrun.

title: JUST THE TWO OF US
synopsis: In this classic lesbian sexploitation flick, married neighbors Adria and Denise plunge into a secret affair. But when hot young actor Jim turns Adria's fickle head, Denise becomes desperate to recapture her illicit love.

title: BUTTERFLY
synopsis: Flavia is a thirtysomething married teacher. She has suppressed the memory of her adolescent lesbian fling and is stuck in a stifling marriage. A chance encounter in a supermarket reawakens dormant feelings and she begins to think back on her teenage affair.

title: MANJI
synopsis: A married kleptomaniac (Sonoko) and a younger woman (Mitsuko) begin an unusual love affair which develops fast into a kinky sexual love triangle when Sonoko's husband gets involved.

title: THE RUFFIAN
synopsis: An amnesiac carnival psychic is haunted by the thought that a man is coming to kill her.

title: CHASING THE MOON
synopsis: The meditations of a Black lesbian grappling with the memory of an attack that makes her wary about being out on the street.

title: A PRAYER BEFORE BIRTH
synopsis: Chronicles with disturbing intensity, the physical and emotional traumas of a young woman's journey from able-bodied exuberance to the acceptance of disability.

title: AN INVITATION TO MARILYN C
synopsis: A short film by Jacqui Duckworth where she actively challenges male supremacy in the porn and film industries with clues for sweet dyke revenge.

title: A SHORT FILM ABOUT US
synopsis: An honest exploration of how cultural identity affects the way you feel about being a lesbian.

title: LE CHANT DES MARIEES
synopsis: The Nazi occupation of Tunisia strains the bonds of friendship between a Muslim woman and a Sephardic Jewess who are both preparing for their marriages.

title: AMOR MALDITO
synopsis: Two young women with different social backgrounds have a lesbian relationship. The real problems begin when one of them also gets involved with a man, a journalist.

title: GLADIATOR EROTICVS: THE LESBIAN WARRIORS
synopsis: It's metal striking metal and flesh caressing flesh as Gladiator Eroticvs brings down the Coliseum with an undefeatable combination of gasping imperial desires, uninhibited female lust and toga-tearing ecstasy.

title: MISTRESS FRANKENSTEIN
synopsis: Dr. Victor Frankenstein neglects the sexual needs of his frigid and frustrated wife Helena. After Helena gets killed in a horse riding accident, Victor decides to bring her back to life.

title: DR. JEKYLL & MISTRESS HYDE
synopsis: Dr. Jackie Stevenson is a Los Angeles based therapist and scientist who tries to invent a serum to separate the pure from the lustful side of the female psychosis.

title: LET'S LOVE HONG KONG
synopsis: Zero, who, like many Hong Kong youngsters, has a handful of unsteady jobs. She takes a fancy to Chan Kwok Chan, whom she stalks. Chan in turn, has a job donning exotic costumes as a cyber papel doll for a porn website and a sex-worker lover who has a son and a separate husband on the mainland.

title: VACATION BLUES
synopsis: A holiday resort serves as a sanctuary for a motley crew of vacationers -- until a rock band (the real-life Bangla rockers of Cactus) shows up from Kolkata to film a music video and disrupt the peace.

title: COCONUT/CANE & CUTLASS
synopsis: A poetic rumination on exile, displacement, and nationhood from the perspective of an Indo-Caribbean lesbian who migrated to Canada 20 years ago, Coconut/ Cane & Cutlass layers front-screen projection, re-created archival images, oral narratives/histories, and dramatic scenes.

title: HE'S A WOMAN, SHE'S A MAN
synopsis: A typical everyday HK movie fan Wing idolizes the beautiful female singer Rose and her producer Sam as the fairy tale couple. By chance she posed as an amateur male singer and moves in with 'his' new producer Sam. The no-nonsense Wing develops a great friendship with Sam, but screws up Sam's love.

title: PEONY PAVILION
synopsis: Lan falls in love with Cui-Hua (a Kunqu opera actress) after watching her performance. Becoming an actress herself, Lan and Cui-Ha become intimate as they play lovers.

title: HAND ON THE PULSE
synopsis: Biography of Joan Nestle and the Lesbian Herstory Archives which she founded.
